name: docus-workspace
description: Minimal Documentation theme and CLI for shared usage across Nuxt modules

scripts.dev:prepare: nuxt prepare layer && nuxt prepare docs --extends ../layer
scripts.verify: bun run dev:prepare && bun run lint && bun run typecheck && bun run docs:build
scripts.layer:release: cd layer && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && bun publish --access public
scripts.cli:release: cd cli && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && bun publish --access public
scripts.release: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && bun run layer:release && bun run cli:release
